item.title: Pahal Isle Evermoon Seal And Treasure Vault Locations In Genshin Impact
item.description:
Pahal Isle is a Nod-Krai area and Flins' home in Genshin Impact . Exploring it will leave players with puzzles to solve, quests to uncover, and chests to locate. Among those are the Precious and Luxurious chest, which Travelers need to find the Evermoon Seals and open Pahal Isle's Treasure Vault .

Pahal Isle Evermoon Seal Locations In Genshin Impact

There are three Pahal Isle Evermoon Seals locations in Genshin Impact , which can be obtained during quests or inside random Precious or Luxurious chests. The required quests are:

  • Priorities First quest in Genshin Impact .
  • The Shoemaker's Children Go Barefoot quest.

During the Priorities First quest​​​​​​, players can locate two Precious chests, while The Shoemaker's Children Go Barefoot quest unlocks six Precious chests and one Luxurious chest if Travelers explore the Kuuvahki Experimental Design Bureau thoroughly.

The Shoemaker's Children Go Barefoot Quest In Genshin Impact

Pahal Isle Precious Chest Locations #1-6

Some chests will only spawn in their designated location after completing The Shoemaker's Children Go Barefoot quest in Genshin Impact .

To initiate The Shoemaker's Children Go Barefoot quest, players must:

  • Teleport to Kuuvahki Experimental Design Bureau southern waypoint.
  • Walk north.
  • Take the lift to the upper level.
  • Collect the Precious chest by the boxes.
  • Interact with the control panel to summon a container.
  • Enter the container.
  • Go up the vent on the right.

Afterward, follow the quest marker until you need to save a girl, then use the control panel to switch control to the Cleaning Bot. Grab the ID Card on the table and use the Bot passage to go behind the barrier. Once the Bot is in the cell, switch the control back to Traveler and grab the ID Card, then climb on top of the box to swipe the Card on the seal and clear the barrier.

  • Defeat the Fatui.
  • Follow the quest marker again.
  • Beat down more Genshin Impact enemies before the time runs out and backup arrives.
  • Collect the Precious chest from the Archives section.
  • Look for clues.
  • Operate the Cleaning Bot.
  • Clean the dirty spots to avoid being detected.
  • Grab the ID Card from the Fatui's backpack.
  • Open the locked gate.
  • Defeat the enemies.
  • Follow Netochka.
  • Pull the hammer with the Kuuvahki Energy to crush the machine multiple times.
  • Use the Destruction Module to reach the upper floor.

Next, players need to follow Netochka until they reach the top floor. To enter the Empowered State from there, go left and destroy the boxes around the Cleaning Bot, then use the control panel to switch control to it.

Drive it towards the blue pole, then use the Jump Higher to reach the Empowered State and unlock the waypoint there. Inside, Travelers will come across Raskolnikov, who will challenge players to a battle. Defeat him with a well-built Genshin Impact team, then talk to Netochka to complete the Shoemaker's Children Go Barefoot quest​​.

After completing the quest, teleport to the Disposal Workshop eastern waypoint and do the following to find the remaining Precious chests in Kuuvahki Experimental Design Bureau:

  • Move south.
  • Glide towards the Middle Level southeastern entrance.
  • Go down the vent.
  • Defeat the enemies guarding the Precious chest to obtain it.
  • Follow the passage to reach the next chest location in Genshin Impact .
  • Go through the rest of the floor passage.
  • Cross to the opposite side when you reach the round room.
  • Go down to reach the Lower Level balcony.
  • Defeat the enemies surrounding the chest and claim it.
  • Take the lift to the Southern Zone.
  • Collect another guarded Precious chest.

Pahal Isle Luxurious Chest Locations #1

Once Raskolnikov is defeated and the quest is completed, players can climb to the platform above the arena to locate a Luxurious chest in Genshin Impact . It should be noted that Travelers must interact with the control panels near the treasures to initiate the challenge.

Pahal Isle Precious And Luxurious Chest Locations In Genshin Impact

Pahal Isle Precious Chest Locations #7-10

The last four Pahal Isle Precious chests are scattered around the rest of the island. Two of them can be obtained during the Priorities First quest in Genshin Impact (yellow), and two after defeating the enemies surrounding them (red).

Pahal Isle Luxurious Chest Locations #2-3

To acquire the remaining two Luxurious chests in Pahal Isle, players need to start a challenge and defeat multiple machines, so be sure to show up with well-built Genshin Impact characters.

Pahal Isle Treasure Vault Location In Genshin Impact

To locate Pahal Isle Treasure Vault in Genshin Impact , Travelers need to follow these steps:

  • Teleport to Maroon Basin northern waypoint.
  • Run west.
  • Hit the snail to charge Kuuvahki Energy.
  • Remove the obstacle.
  • Move into the Salt-Eaten Cave.

Use the three obtained Pahal Isle Evermoon Seals to open it and obtain the rewards inside it.

item.title: How to Complete Trash Talk Quests in NBA 2K26
item.description:
Trash talk is a big part of basketball, and NBA 2K26 features Trash Talk quests that let you prove your dominance over your rivals. Trash Talk quests are required for a few NBA 2K26 Endorsements and challenges, but it's not clear how to start them.

Trash Talk quests are stat-based objectives that take place in the following NBA game after you run your mouth on social media or during a press conference. The game makes you put your money where your mouth is, and if you play well enough, you'll get some VC and other rewards. Here's how to unlock and complete Trash Talk quests in NBA 2K26 .

How to Complete Trash Talk Quests in NBA 2K26

Trash Talk quests pop up randomly throughout the NBA season in NBA 2K26 . After a game, you may get a text on your phone or get an inflammatory question during a press conference. If you take the chance to talk trash about another player, you'll be given a Trash Talk quest to complete during your next game.

You'll know that a specific dialogue option will trigger a Trash Talk quest if it has an objective and VC payout listed next to it. Trash Talk objectives range from outscoring your rivals to shutting down their offense, so try to pick a quest that plays to your player's strengths .

If you start a Trash Talk quest, your rival will start the next game hot. If you manage to beat him, you'll start the following game hot while he starts off cold.

If you're in a hurry, you can sim until your next key NBA game instead of playing every single match. Trash Talk opportunities will pop up as the simulation runs, so you won't miss anything. Make sure you have decent performance in the NBA games that you have played before choosing to sim, though. Your sim performance is based on the stats you've already put up, so you'll lose a bunch of sim games if you haven't established yourself as a dominant player yet.

Trash Talk opportunities are quite rare during your first NBA season , but they'll become more common as you gain fans and assert yourself as a star player in the league. Completing Trash Talk quests is required to complete certain NBA 2K26 MyCareer challenges like unlocking the Slam Magazine Endorsement, so don't be afraid to put yourself out there. If you can play well, it'll catapult you even further into stardom.

item.title: Priorities First Quest In Genshin Impact (Data Storage Cassette Puzzle Solution)
item.description:
Priorities First is a Genshin Impact quest where players need to investigate the Fatui’s mysterious facility. The experimental institute will lead players to discover the Fatui’s Kuuvahki energy-harnessing mechanism inside their Underground Research Center.

Priorities First Quest In Genshin Impact

To initiate the Priorities First quest in Genshin Impact , Travelers must do the following:

  • Teleport to Kuuvahki Experimental Design Bureau's western island teleport waypoint.
  • Enter the northern building
  • Use the elevator to descend to the lower floor.
  • Climb the box.
  • Pull the ID Card with the Kuuvahki Energy.
  • Pass it over the two barrier seals.
  • Move further down after unlocking the waypoint.
  • Bypass the trap by using the side rooms.
  • Interact with the screen to stop the trap.
  • Defeat the Genshin Impact enemy.

Afterward, follow the quest marker until you have to avoid another trap. However, this time it won’t be as easy, since players will need to unlock the sealed side rooms to use them as an escape route. To do so, grab the ID Cards inside the rooms while avoiding the Kuuvahki Energy, then use the rooms to avoid the trap and turn it off from the other side.

Upon completing this step, follow the instructions until the quest reaches the part where Travelers have to retrieve three Data Storage Cassettes. The quest marker will mark their location on the map, but it’s up to players to solve them and obtain an Exquisite chest and two Precious chests in Genshin Impact .

Data Storage Cassette Puzzle #1

To solve the first puzzle, players need to do the following:

  • Fast travel to Kuuvahki Experimental Design Bureau's western island waypoint.
  • Head east.
  • Pull the ID Card.
  • Swipe it left over the three barrier seals.
  • Defeat the activated machines.
  • Collect the Exquisite chest in Genshin Impact .

This will spawn a Data Storage Cassette in Travelers’ inventory; players will need two more.

Data Storage Cassette Puzzle #2

To solve the second Data Storage Cassette puzzle, players will first need to know that there will be a Cleaning Bot circling the barrier, which will supply Travelers with Kuuvahki Energy when it's near. Second, follow these steps to acquire the Precious chest behind it:

  • Teleport to the waypoint northeast of the Kuuvahki Experimental Design Bureau.
  • Run north.
  • Stand in front of the blue glowing box.
  • Wait until the Cleaning Bot reaches you.
  • Use the supplied Kuuvahki Energy to pull the chest forward.
  • Move to the other side of the barrier.
  • Wait for the Bot again.
  • Grab the ID Card with the provided Energy.
  • Keep pace with the Cleaning Bot.
  • Swipe the Card behind the seals to break the barrier.
  • Get the Precious chest to obtain the second Data Storage Cassette.

Opening the chest has a chance to drop a Pahal Isle Evermoon Seal in Genshin Impact .

Data Storage Cassette Puzzle #3

To acquire the last Data Storage Cassette, Travelers need to:

  • Fast travel to North Harbor waypoint.
  • Move southwest.
  • Open the cargo hatch to the left barrier to release another Cleaning Bot.
  • Go in front of the barrier.
  • Pull the ID Card with the Kuuvahki Energy, provided by the still Bot.
  • Scan the first seal with it.
  • Slowly move left around the barrier to swipe the second seal.
  • Stay still until the moving Cleaning Bot reaches you.
  • Move along with it around the barrier to unlock the last two seals.
  • Collect the Precious chest.

If players wish to complete the Priorities First quest, do this:

  • Teleport to Kuuvahki Experimental Design Bureau Underground Research Center.
  • Submit the data.
  • Grab the Kuuvahki Relay Mechanism with the Kuuvahki Energy to destroy the shield.
  • Defeat the spawned enemies with a well-built Genshin Impact team.
  • Investigate the strange sound.

The Priorities First mission will end and reward players with 40 Primogems, and the Tempus Fugit, Pecunia Fugit Achievement in Genshin Impact .

item.title: Best Roguelike Games That Respect Your Time
item.description:
Summary

  • Many roguelike games offer short gameplay sessions of around 30 minutes to respect the player's time.
  • Hades, Slay the Spire, and Balatro are examples of roguelike games that provide quick and engaging experiences.
  • Titles like Dead Cells, Cult of the Lamb, and Downwell combine different genres to create engaging short playthroughs.

Players who have enjoyed a variety of roguelike titles will likely be aware that many of these games can be near infinite in their playtime. However, while a player can play them multiple times or keep falling back into the various dungeons in the hopes of finally completing the game, roguelikes are great due to how short each run within them can be, therefore respecting players' time.

Not every gamer has several hours that they can commit to a title. While some other genres of games, such as RPGs or open-world titles, may have stories that can last hundreds of hours, roguelike games instead challenge the player for usually 30 minutes to see if they can make it to the end. These are some of the best roguelikes, as well as a few roguelite options, that have been known to respect the player's time instead of trapping them in countless unneeded hours of torment.

Hades

Interesting Stories Woven Into A Great Roguelite

Hades
10 /10
16
8.9 /10
Released
September 17, 2020

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
T for Teen: Alcohol Reference, Blood, Mild Language, Suggestive Themes, Violence
Developer(s)
Supergiant Games
Platform(s)
PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Switch, PC
Powered by

Hades is by far one of the most prominent roguelite titles in recent years. While the game itself has countless hours of gameplay with a unique cast of characters brought along by the stories of Ancient Greece and its gods, the actual runs themselves can be rather short, depending on the skills of the player.

Zagreus is always attempting to escape his father, Hades, and the Underworld, which he calls his home. By fighting his way through various floors of Hades, Zagreus will finally make it to the surface. Hades respects the player's time as these runs are usually under an hour long, though the more times a player escapes or beats a boss, the harder it will get. However, a player never truly feels like they have lost any time.

Cult Of The Lamb

Find Resources And Followers Quickly To Build The Cult

Cult of the Lamb
8 /10
11
8.9 /10
Released
August 11, 2022

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL

ESRB
Teen / Blood, Violence.
Developer(s)
Massive Monster
Platform(s)
PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch
Powered by

Cult of the Lamb proves that this genre of gaming can easily mix with others to create appealing experiences that still respect the player's time.

When a player isn't tending to their flock in Cult of the Lamb , they will be required to take part in the roguelite mechanics of the game to both take down the various bishops that are keeping the player's god chained, but also to collect the resources the flock so desperately needs. These different areas aren't very long to allow players to quickly work through them while also being sure to not leave their cult for long, as they cannot always survive alone.

Slay The Spire

Quick, Daily Climbs Allow Players To Test Themselves

Slay the Spire
9 /10
10
9.4 /10
Released
January 23, 2019

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
E10+ For Everyone 10+ Due To Fantasy Violence, Mild Blood, Tobacco Reference
Developer(s)
Mega Crit
Platform(s)
Android, iOS, PC, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, Xbox One
Powered by

Another great roguelike option that respects the player's time is Slay the Spire . While a player new to Slay the Spire may take a little longer, the usual duration of a run in this roguelike deck-builder title is roughly around 30 minutes to an hour. Players can take part in the story or test their strength against other players as they race one another in the daily climb.

The game incorporates an assortment of pre-made decks to choose from and features multiple encounters to keep fans busy. A player who has only a small amount of time to enjoy games while also looking for a title that doesn't expect them to invest countless hours is sure to see plenty of appeal in playing this incredible title.

Balatro

Runs Are Determined By The Player's Luck

Balatro
21
8.9 /10
Released
February 20, 2024

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL

ESRB
E10+ For Everyone 10+ // Gambling Themes
Developer(s)
LocalThunk
Platform(s)
PC, PS4, PS5, Switch, Xbox One, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Android, iOS
Powered by

Slay the Spire isn't the only card roguelike title that players should give a chance. Since Balatro was released in 2024, it has garnered a large fan base of those addicted to testing their luck in poker with plenty of extra steps. Each game of Balatro is entirely down to the player's smart choices, with a slight hint of luck depending on the cards in their hand, and the Jokers that can be purchased.

Like many other mentioned roguelikes, Balatro is another that has runs that can vary from 30 minutes to an hour, depending on the player's luck when it comes to poker hands. With no true story for players to remember, Balatro respects the player's time while also allowing them to save in the middle of a run if they need to return to it at a later date.

Vampire Survivors

Each Stage Provides A Simple But Fun Challenge

Vampire Survivors
12
9.2 /10
Released
December 17, 2021

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL

ESRB
T For Teen // Blood, Violence
Developer(s)
Luca Galante
Platform(s)
Mobile, Nintendo Switch, PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series S, Xbox Series X
Powered by

Players looking for roguelike titles that purely focus on allowing them to beat their previous score should look no further than Vampire Survivors . This pixel shooter title provides players with a simple goal of trying to survive the entire time against a horde of undead. With an assortment of characters and weaponry to unlock, as time goes on, the game gets much harder.

However, Vampire Survivors does have an end. Depending on the stage, many players are only expected to survive 30 minutes while also defeating the requisite boss. Players can then revisit these stages with other characters and experiment with other upgrades when they have the time.

Spelunky

Never Takes Too Long Diving Into The Ruins

Spelunky
6 /10
8.5 /10
Released
October 21, 2008

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
T For Teen due to Fantasy Violence, Blood, Mild Suggestive Themes
Developer(s)
Mossmouth
Platform(s)
PC, PS3, PS4, PS Vita, Switch, Xbox 360
Powered by

Although Spelunky is mainly considered a platforming title, there are large parts of it that are heavily influenced by the roguelike genre, which sees this game deserving of a spot among the other titles that respect the player's time. Whether playing alone or with friends, the player must challenge themselves to go deep within Spelunky to find some of the greatest treasures.

As another roguelike title with runs that can last between 30 minutes and an hour, Spelunky provides the player with plenty of shortcuts, so they aren't wasting any time. Players won't be getting bored in Spelunky either, as each new run of this platforming game provides the player with a newly generated world to explore.

Dead Cells

A Visually Pleasing Roguelite Metroidvania

Dead Cells
8.8 /10
Released
August 7, 2018

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
T For Teen Due To Blood and Gore, Language, Violence
Developer(s)
Motion Twin
Platform(s)
Android, iOS, Nintendo Switch, PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One
Powered by

Dead Cells is quite an intense roguelite title, requiring a bit more time from fans. However, as players begin to become accustomed to Dead Cells , they will find that this game is sure to respect their time when they sit down to play it.

With zero checkpoints, it is up to the player to try their hardest to defeat the final boss. Staying alive at first may only be for a few moments, but eventually players will find themselves surviving for an entire run, which could range anywhere between a quick 20 minutes to much longer, depending on the player's skill. However, Dead Cells is still great for when players only have a few moments to enjoy something while also looking for something visually pleasing.

Downwell

No Two Adventures Feel The Same In This Roguelike

Downwell
Action
Roguelike
Systems
Released
October 15, 2015

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
e
Platform(s)
Android, iOS, PC, Switch, PS4, PS Vita
Powered by

Downwell proves that a game doesn't need to be overly detailed to keep fans invested. This pixel roguelike title may arguably be one of the shortest mentioned, with successful attempts usually taking players between 15 and 20 minutes to complete.

Every time a player fails in Downwell , there is a new randomly generated well to fall down, though the gameplay can be quite difficult at times, as a player can never be truly prepared. This roguelike is perfect for those with a few extra minutes to spare while hoping to play something that will challenge them.

item.title: 8 Ways You Made A Game Harder Without Realizing
item.description:
Video games are meant to challenge players, but there are times when this happens in a subtle way that fans don't expect. What may seem like a simple action early has nightmarish consequences later down the line when players are made to pay for a mistake they never made.

This can make certain moments in video games way tougher than fans would expect. While players can still power through these difficulty spikes, they will rue the moment they made a decision that couldn't be undone.

Being Too Good In God Hand

Players Will Get Into A Flow State And Not Realize That Difficulty Has Reached "Die" Level

3 Images
3 Images
God Hand
8.0 /10
Released
October 10, 2006

WHERE TO PLAY

PHYSICAL

ESRB
m // Blood and Gore, Language, Suggestive Themes, Violence
Powered by

To be fair, the difficulty level is something that players will be aware of in God Hand , for the most part. However, once players reach a flow state, things can get so chaotic that players may not even realize they're reached difficulty level Die until it's too late.

The sheer amount of damage and punishment they incur when this difficulty level is reached is no joke. If players realize the mistake they've made by being too good at the game, they should definitely bow down and prostrate to lower the difficulty and make things more manageable for them.

Hugging Fia In Elden Ring

Most Players Didn't Even Know That Their HP Gets Debuffed After This

6 Images
6 Images
Elden Ring
10 /10
69
9.1 /10
Released
February 25, 2022

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Language, Suggestive Themes, Violence
Powered by

Elden Ring may be a great video game, but it continues the FromSoftware tradition of explaining things poorly to players. So, when they hug a person on their deathbed, the last thing they expect is for this moment to incur a significant debuff.

It'll take a while for players to even register a debuff that reduces their total health by 5%. It may not seem like a lot, but every hit point in Elden Ring counts, especially when players face off against some of the game's strongest bosses.

Getting A Free Biochip Upgrade In Deus Ex: Human Revolution

Makes The Boss Fight Against Namir Way Harder

Deus Ex: Human Revolution
9 /10
8.3 /10
Released
August 23, 2011

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood, Drug Reference, Intense Violence, Sexual Themes, Strong Language, Use of Alcohol
Powered by

Human Revolution is one of the best Deus Ex games that fans universally praised, although the boss fights were universally criticized for forcing players into combat, regardless of their approach in other parts of the game. This, in itself, would make the encounter against Jaron annoying, but there's another way this boss fight becomes harder to handle.

If players go for a free Biochip upgrade in China, Jaron can hack Adam's cybernetics and make them ineffective in this battle. This, coupled with the annoying visual glitches that follow, makes the boss fight against Jaron way harder than it has any right to be.

Becoming A Vampire In The Elder Scrolls 5: Skyrim

Getting Damaged By The Sun Isn't Ideal

6 Images
6 Images
The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
9 /10
81
9.5 /10
Released
November 11, 2011

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M For Mature 17+ Due To Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Sexual Themes, Use of Alcohol
Powered by

At a glance, being a vampire may seem cool in Skyrim . Players gain access to unique spells and transformations that make the gameplay more dynamic than ever.

However, this also comes with a pretty big drawback — the inability to stay out in the sun. Players will receive steady damage in the light, which forces them to only travel in the night and robs them of the beauty present in Skyrim 's world that truly shines when the sun is out.

Using Illithid Powers Too Many Times In Baldur's Gate 3

Resisting The Mind Flayer Becomes Harder

Baldur's Gate 3
9 /10
141
9.7 /10
Released
August 3, 2023

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Partial Nudity, Sexual Content, Strong Language, Violence
Powered by

Baldur's Gate 3 is one of the best RPGs ever made, where almost every choice has a hidden consequence. This includes the option to use the illithid parasite to manipulate others, which can have an unexpected consequence later down the line.

When the Mind Flayer is convincing the player to pursue his plan, players will find it harder to fight back against his influence. This is a fitting consequence for players relying on the power of a parasite they're trying to get rid of and proves once again why the role-playing in Baldur's Gate 3 is off the charts.

Choosing The Wrong Party Members When The Ship Crashes In Divinity: Original Sin 2

Players May Be Stuck With Companions That Make The Final Act Way Harder To Get Through

Divinity: Original Sin 2
8.6 /10
Released
September 14, 2017

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Language, Sexual Themes, Violence
Powered by

Divinity: Original Sin 2 is far from the easiest RPG, with the first and last acts being especially nightmarish to deal with. Early on, players coming to grips with the physical and magical armor system will be scrounging for equipment that doesn't leave them vulnerable to status effects.

However, the real kicker comes just when players are about to land near Arx. A cataclysmic event on the ship leads to multiple casualties, and only the people in the hero's party survive. This can make the adventures in and around the city more unbearable, especially since enemies become trickier to deal with than ever before.

Playing As A Nosferatu In Vampire: The Masquerade – Bloodlines

Getting A Masquerade Violation Just By Being Spotted Is Brutal

3 Images
3 Images
Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines
Action RPG
Systems
Released
November 16, 2004

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
M For Mature 17+ Due To Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Sexual Themes, Strong Language
Powered by

Vampire: The Masquerade — Bloodlines features two classes that completely change how players approach the game. Malkavians are insane and talk in riddles, but players who don't mind filling in the gaps and dealing with some nonsensical dialogue will have a blast with this race.

The same can't be said of the Nosferatu, who are so heinous that even appearing in public leads to a Masquerade Violation. Players must stick to the sewers and stay out of sight if they don't want to be taken down by Hunters who want to take them out and ensure that the society of vampires isn't exposed to the public.

Killing Too Many People In Dishonored

Players Are Routed To The Bad Ending With More Enemies To Deal With

Dishonored
9 /10
9.5 /10
Released
October 9, 2012

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M For Mature 17+ Due To Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Sexual Themes, Strong Language
Powered by

Dishonored is one of the best games ever made that encouraged players to opt for the non-lethal route, even if it was way less interesting to play the game this way. However, if players went on a rampage as Corvo and killed everyone in sight, they would head towards the bad ending and deal with harder stages.

Some characters will betray the player and make things harder for Corvo, the number of Weepers in the game increases (since more corpses cause the Rat Plague to spread easily), and there are more guards around to stand in the player's way.
